titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, 14. 11. 1946
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 184; deutsch: Briefe, S. 223f.; Cambridge Letters, S. 324; WiC, S. 403).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I don't believe for a moment that you'll want to come to the Moral Sc. Club tonight (I'm giving a talk, roughly, on what I believe philosophy is, or what the method of philosophy is) â€’ but I want to say that if you should turn up for the paper, or the discussion, the club, & particularly I, would be honoured.
